tool.name: feature
tool.command:
chakin feature load_fasta '$fasta' '$organism_id'
#if $sequence_type: --sequence_type '$sequence_type' #end if #if $analysis_id: --analysis_id '$analysis_id' #end if #if $re_name: --re_name '$re_name' #end if #if $re_uniquename: --re_uniquename '$re_uniquename' #end if #if $match_on_name: $match_on_name #end if #if $update: $update #end if #if $db: --db '$db' #end if #if $re_db_accession: --re_db_accession '$re_db_accession' #end if #if $rel_type: --rel_type '$rel_type' #end if #if $re_parent: --re_parent '$re_parent' #end if #if $parent_type: --parent_type '$parent_type' #end if
> $results

param.name: fasta
param.label: Fasta
param.help: Path to the Fasta file to load

param.name: re_name
param.label: Re Name
param.help: Regular expression to extract the feature name from the fasta sequence id (first capturing group will be used).

param.name: re_uniquename
param.label: Re Uniquename
param.help: Regular expression to extract the feature name from the fasta sequence id (first capturing group will be used).

param.name: match_on_name
param.label: Match On Name
param.help: Match existing features using their name instead of their uniquename

param.name: update
param.label: Update
param.help: Update existing feature with new sequence instead of throwing an error

param.name: db
param.label: Db
param.help: External database to cross reference to.

param.name: re_db_accession
param.label: Re Db Accession
param.help: Regular expression to extract an external database accession from the fasta sequence id (first capturing group will be used).

param.name: rel_type
param.label: Rel Type
param.help: Relation type to parent feature ('part_of' or 'derives_from').

param.name: re_parent
param.label: Re Parent
param.help: Regular expression to extract parent uniquename from the fasta sequence id (first capturing group will be used).

param.name: parent_type
param.label: Parent Type
param.help: Sequence type of the parent feature

tool.help:
Load features from a fasta file
@HELP@
